mapper.sql: object_id, biddee_id, object_no, object_name, object_amount, object_publish_type, object_status, win_bid_amount, win_bidder_id, industry_id, sector_id, province, district, biddee_company_principal, biddee_company_telephone, bid_open_date, project_expect_period, contract_type, currency, bid_bond_amount, need_business_standard, need_technical_standard, need_certification_checkup_file, need_pm_certification, need_constructor_certification, need_safety_permit, need_pm_safety_certification, evaluation_amount, object_scope, win_bid_time
mapper.select: select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_biddee b on a.biddee_id = b.id where b.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (a.object_status = 'PUB' or a.object_status = 'REV')
select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_biddee b on a.biddee_id = b.id where b.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.object_status = 'SEL'
select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_biddee b on a.biddee_id = b.id where b.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.object_status = 'END'

select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_bidder b on a.win_bidder_id = b.id where b.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (a.object_status = 'PUB' or a.object_status = 'REV')
select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_bidder b on a.win_bidder_id = b.id where b.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.object_status = 'SEL'
select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_bidder b on a.win_bidder_id = b.id where b.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.object_status = 'END'
select count(id) from t_ztgl_object a inner JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b ON a.object_id = b.object_id inner JOIN t_qyzz_biddee c on c.id = a.biddee_id where c.user_id =#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_gcgl_project p on a.object_id = p.object_id inner JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b ON a.object_id = b.object_id inner JOIN t_qyzz_biddee c on c.id = a.biddee_id LEFT JOIN t_gcgl_project_payment_receive d on (a.object_id = d.object_id and d.status = 'OK#') LEFT JOIN t_gcgl_project_payment_receive e on (a.object_id = e.object_id and e.status = 'CRT') where c.user_id =#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p.staus = 'OK#'

select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_gcgl_project p on a.object_id = p.object_id inner JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b ON a.object_id = b.object_id inner JOIN t_qyzz_biddee c on c.id = a.biddee_id LEFT JOIN t_gcgl_project_payment_receive d on (a.object_id = d.object_id and d.status = 'OK#') LEFT JOIN t_gcgl_project_payment_receive e on (a.object_id = e.object_id and e.status = 'CRT') where c.user_id =#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p.staus = 'OK#'

select a.object_no,a.object_name,a.win_bid_amount,c.company_name,d.total_amount receivedAmount,e.total_amount willReceiveAmount,a.project_expect_period,b.project_expect_start_date from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_gcgl_project p on a.object_id = p.object_id inner JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b ON a.object_id = b.object_id inner JOIN t_qyzz_biddee c on c.id = a.biddee_id LEFT JOIN t_gcgl_project_payment_receive d on (a.object_id = d.object_id and d.status = 'OK#') LEFT JOIN t_gcgl_project_payment_receive e on (a.object_id = e.object_id and e.status = 'CRT') where c.user_id =#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p.staus = 'OK#'

select a.industry_id,a.object_no,a.object_name,a.win_bid_amount,c.company_name from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_gcgl_project p on a.object_id = p.object_id inner JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b ON a.object_id = b.object_id inner JOIN t_qyzz_biddee c on c.id = a.biddee_id where c.user_id =#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p.staus = 'END'

select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a inner JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b ON a.object_id = b.object_id inner JOIN t_qyzz_biddee c on c.id = a.biddee_id LEFT JOIN t_xyjf_biddee_bid_credit_score d on d.object_id = a.object_id LEFT JOIN t_xyjf_score_level e on (d.score >e.min_score and d.score <e.max_score) where 1=1
a.object_name like CONCAT('%','${item}','%' )

select count(a.object_id) from t_ztgl_object a inner JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b ON a.object_id = b.object_id inner JOIN t_qyzz_biddee c on c.id = a.biddee_id LEFT JOIN t_xyjf_biddee_bid_credit_score d on d.object_id = a.object_id LEFT JOIN t_xyjf_score_level e on (d.score >e.min_score and d.score <e.max_score)
select count(a.object_id) bidNum,IFNULL(sum(a.win_bid_amount),0) amount from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b on a.object_id = b.object_id where a.object_status = 'SEL'

select count(a.object_id) INNER JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b on a.object_id = b.object_id LEFT JOIN t_qyzz_biddee c on a.biddee_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_qyzz_bidder d on a.win_bidder_id = d.id where a.object_status = 'SEL'

select a.object_id,a.object_name,c.short_name bideeName,d.short_name biderName,a.win_bid_amount from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_ztgl_bid_project_info b on a.object_id = b.object_id LEFT JOIN t_qyzz_biddee c on a.biddee_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_qyzz_bidder d on a.win_bidder_id = d.id where a.object_status = 'SEL'
limit #{page.firstResult,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,#{page.pageSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into t_ztgl_object (object_id, biddee_id, object_no, object_name, object_amount, object_publish_type, object_status, win_bid_amount, win_bidder_id, industry_id, sector_id, province, district, biddee_company_principal, biddee_company_telephone, bid_open_date, project_expect_period, contract_type, currency, bid_bond_amount, need_business_standard, need_technical_standard, need_certification_checkup_file, need_pm_certification, need_constructor_certification, need_safety_permit, need_pm_safety_certification, evaluation_amount, object_scope, win_bid_time ) values (#{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{objectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{objectPublishType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{winBidAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{winBidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{biddeeCompanyPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{biddeeCompanyTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidOpenDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{projectExpectPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidBondAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{needBusinessStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needTechnicalStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needCertificationCheckupFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needPmCertification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needConstructorCertification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needSafetyPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needPmSafetyCertification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluationAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{objectScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{winBidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update t_ztgl_object
biddee_id = #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
object_no = #{objectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
object_name = #{objectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
object_amount = #{objectAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
object_publish_type = #{objectPublishType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
object_status = #{objectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
win_bid_amount = #{winBidAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
win_bidder_id = #{winBidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sector_id = #{sectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER},
district = #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER},
biddee_company_principal = #{biddeeCompanyPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
biddee_company_telephone = #{biddeeCompanyTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bid_open_date = #{bidOpenDate,jdbcType=DATE},
project_expect_period = #{projectExpectPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_type = #{contractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bid_bond_amount = #{bidBondAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
need_business_standard = #{needBusinessStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_technical_standard = #{needTechnicalStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_certification_checkup_file = #{needCertificationCheckupFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_pm_certification = #{needPmCertification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_constructor_certification = #{needConstructorCertification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_safety_permit = #{needSafetyPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_pm_safety_certification = #{needPmSafetyCertification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evaluation_amount = #{evaluationAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
object_scope = #{objectScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
win_bid_time = #{winBidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_ztgl_object set biddee_id = #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, object_no = #{objectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, object_name = #{objectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, object_amount = #{objectAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, object_publish_type = #{objectPublishType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, object_status = #{objectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, win_bid_amount = #{winBidAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, win_bidder_id = #{winBidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sector_id = #{sectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district = #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, biddee_company_principal = #{biddeeCompanyPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biddee_company_telephone = #{biddeeCompanyTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bid_open_date = #{bidOpenDate,jdbcType=DATE}, project_expect_period = #{projectExpectPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_type = #{contractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bid_bond_amount = #{bidBondAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, need_business_standard = #{needBusinessStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_technical_standard = #{needTechnicalStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_certification_checkup_file = #{needCertificationCheckupFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_pm_certification = #{needPmCertification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_constructor_certification = #{needConstructorCertification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_safety_permit = #{needSafetyPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_pm_safety_certification = #{needPmSafetyCertification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluation_amount = #{evaluationAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, object_scope = #{objectScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, win_bid_time = #{winBidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
